description: This file declares functions related to handling MAP (Mesh Access Point) TLVs (Type-Length-Value) for the RdkEasyMeshController component, including getters and fill functions for various TLV types used in 1905 networking standard implementation.

methods.name: map_free_bridging_cap_tlv
methods.description: Frees the memory allocated for the bridging capabilities TLV.

methods.name: map_get_1905_neighbor_tlvs
methods.description: Obtains a list of 1905 neighbor device TLVs.

methods.name: map_free_1905_neighbor_tlv
methods.description: Frees the memory for a list of 1905 neighbor device TLVs.

methods.name: map_get_error_code_tlv
methods.description: Retrieves an error code TLV given a station MAC and reason code.

methods.name: map_get_ap_metrics_tlv
methods.description: Gets the AP metrics TLV for a given BSS information.

methods.name: map_get_receiver_link_metric_tlv
methods.description: Gets receiver link metric TLV for a local interface MAC and neighbor link metrics.

methods.name: map_get_transmitter_link_metric_tlv
methods.description: Gets transmitter link metric TLV for a local interface MAC and neighbor link metrics.

methods.name: map_fill_channel_preference_tlv
methods.description: Fills a channel preference TLV based on radio info and preference type.

methods.name: map_fill_transmit_power_tlv
methods.description: Fills transmit power limit TLV based on radio info.

methods.name: map_fill_channel_scan_request_tlv
methods.description: Fills a channel scan request TLV with scan capabilities and optional channels.

methods.name: map_fill_default_8021q_settings_tlv
methods.description: Fills default 802.1Q settings TLV with configuration parameters.

methods.name: map_fill_traffic_separation_policy_tlv
methods.description: Fills traffic separation policy TLV with provided configuration.

methods.name: map_fill_empty_traffic_separation_policy_tlv
methods.description: Initializes an empty traffic separation policy TLV.
